column2: Choose a patron deity
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Moradin, god of dwarves, crafts and creation.
Berronar Truesilver, goddess of the hearth and home.
Dumathoin, god of mining, gems and shield dwarves.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Clangeddin Silverbeard, god of valor and honor.
Gorm Gulthyn, god of defense and vigilance.
Haela Brightaxe, goddes of luck and battle.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Dugmaren Brightmantle, god of scholarship and invention.
Marthammor Duin, god of wanderers.
Vergadain, god of trade and negotiation.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Sharindlar, goddes of fertility and healing.
Abbathor, god of greed.
There are others...
